item.title: Dependencies Injection
item.description: This is not an easy subject. So I always wanted to write about it since a long time ago. This big subject deserves a series of Posts, but I don’t wanna make it too long. I will just express some random thoughts about DI in all kind of layers: principle’s, theories, code practices. so this posts might be a little messy and un-structured! Conforming Container (From the Mark Seemann’s blog post)
